ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Crystal Caverns in Velious
ygData.msgSnippet: BTW...training back to the town will not help. The guards will NOT kill Orcs. They will however kill the terrors and spiders if they are brought into the town.
ygData.messageBody:
BTW...training back to the town will not help. The guards will NOT kill
Orcs. They will however kill the terrors and spiders if they are brought
into the town.

-----Original Message-----
From: The Mad Macinchaote [mailto:scendera@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 08, 2001 12:54 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Crystal Caverns in Velious


I don't think it would work well, but I've also never tried it. My
understanding is that you would need lots of room for that, and areas to
kite/reverse kite through. This is tight quarters fighting, the sort a tank
excels at. The blues are soloable by a warrior, I only suggest Pally and
Ranger bc they can heal themselves to cut downtime.

----- Original Message -----
From: Jackie <mailto:jrshell@...>
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com <mailto:EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, March 08, 2001 1:28 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Crystal Caverns in Velious



How about necros soloing there????

Chariti


----- Original Message -----
From: The Mad <mailto:scendera@...> Macinchaote
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com <mailto:EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, March 08, 2001 1:14 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Crystal Caverns in Velious

Pallys and Rangers, possibly SK's could solo there and get a level an hour
from 36 to 38. I had a druid helping me (I'm warrior) and it took one
evening for me to get those levels.

----- Original Message -----
From: Danspath <mailto:danspth@...>
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com <mailto:EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, March 08, 2001 9:54 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Crystal Caverns in Velious


Crystal Caverns in Velious? And I've heard snow cougars are good hunting as
well. Think I will give that a try...
